English: Be careful, a tornado is coming.
This is a man and this is a woman.
What can we do at the house?
Do you want to build a snowman?
This is a good day to dance
Everyday we are learning new things.
We are praying for our Comanche people today.

Comanche: Nʉse nʉ nʉmʉ̠, na tsaa nabanaʔitʉ

English: I am happy we are together
Did you put up your Christmas tree?
